long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The perfect way to start your online day!

The page shows the title, comic and the alt text, as well as a link to the original comic.

Refresh the page or open another tab to see another random comic!

All content sourced from https://xkcd.com/
